entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
